name: Classic Pong (Ash Al Ansari)
description:
Faithful recreation of Classic Pong by watching a gameplay video from the original 70s arcade game.  Made it a bit easier though.

Small 1-week practice project made with GameMaker.

Controls:

  • Player 1: Arrow keys up, down
  • Player 2: "W" up, "S" down
  • Start Game: Enter
  • Reset Game: Home
  • Close Game: Esc
  • Fullscreen Toggle: F11
